text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump @HHSGov So now he's donating to confront, contain, and combat #Coronavirus that he keeps telling us is a "Hoax" that the Democrats started. Give us a freakin break @PressSec, the person that is taking taxpayer money 4 doing ZERO. How many months has it been since u gave a briefing?#Liar
